description: line drawing style with thick black outlines; image of a seated woman wearing a long dress with yellow stripes on skirt holding a blue book (?) on her lap; green table with drum-shaped blue container with yellow and blue flowers at left; green background at left; blue background at right; received framed in blonde wood frame
provenance: Bruce B. Dayton (Minneapolis); by descent to his wife Ruth Dayton Stricker (Minneapolis).
title: Marie-José en robe jaune (Marie-José in a Yellow Dress)
